items.titolo: Best of MWC 2026: Live updates on phones, concepts, and robots we're seeing
items.descrizione: It's the weekend before Mobile World Congress, and we've got a full slate of announcements from Xiaomi, Honor, and more.

items.titolo: Oricio BookDrive P10Plus (512GB) review: Magnetic back and 100W passthrough charging
items.descrizione: Orico's BookDrive P10Plus feels solid and has a magnetic back for snapping onto smartphones, as well as a 100w passthrough charging port. But its performance is lacking in one key area – especially for professional users

items.titolo: Enthusiast runs desktop PC off 56 AA batteries — Intel computer lasts less than 5 minutes while playing Minesweeper
items.descrizione: YouTube creator ScuffedBits experimented with a desktop PC and AA batteries just to see how many they needed to run and for how long will a desktop PC last on AA battery power alone.

items.titolo: Honor Magic V6 è ufficiale: ancora più potente e sottile ma con batteria super

items.titolo: The Nvidia GeForce3 launched 25 years ago — underappreciated at launch, its impact shaped the industry
items.descrizione: Technological evolution rarely looks important in the moment. In fact, sometimes it even looks like a regression.

items.titolo: California introduces age verification law for all operating systems, including Linux and SteamOS — user age verified during OS account setup
items.descrizione: The law's broad definition of an "operating system provider" pulls in not just Windows, macOS, Android, and iOS, but Linux distributions and Valve's SteamOS.

items.titolo: I tested Xiaomi's matte-glass tablet for a month, and it effectively replaced my iPad
items.descrizione: The Xiaomi Pad 8 Pro Matte Glass variant has an anti-reflective screen, a flagship processor, and upgraded accessories to take on the iPads.

items.titolo: Make the Most of Chrome's Toolbar by Customizing It to Your Liking
items.descrizione: There are plenty of ways to customize Chrome to make it easier to navigate the web, manage your tasks, and make your workflow more efficient.
